entry.title: rajnandiniis/Todo-app-challenge: This project is a cost-effective and lightweight Task and Project Management System designed to store project and task details in a database and display them on a user-friendly webpage. Developed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it prioritizes simplicity, accessibility, and minimal resource consumption. This approach makes it ideal for applications

entry.title: devashtar/stick-n-roll: stick-n-roll is a lightweight and user-friendly npm package that enables HTML elements to have functionality similar to position: sticky, with the added ability to scroll the block.

entry.title: park-jun-woo/ua-parser-k8s: ua-parser-k8s is a lightweight, Kubernetes-native microservice that provides User-Agent parsing as an API. It utilizes the popular ua-parser-js library to analyze User-Agent strings and extract device, browser, and OS information efficiently.
entry.content: ua-parser-k8s is a lightweight, Kubernetes-native microservice that provides User-Agent parsing as an API. It utilizes the popular ua-parser-js library to analyze User-Agent strings and extract device, browser, and OS information efficiently.

entry.title: ShoaibShokat03/stylejs: StyleJS is a lightweight JavaScript library designed to simplify the process of styling HTML elements with enhanced features such as responsive design and media queries. By allowing inline styling directly within HTML elements, StyleJS eliminates the need for external CSS files, making it ideal for quick prototyping and streamlined development.
entry.content: StyleJS is a lightweight JavaScript library designed to simplify the process of styling HTML elements with enhanced features such as responsive design and media queries. By allowing inline styling directly within HTML elements, StyleJS eliminates the need for external CSS files, making it ideal for quick prototyping and streamlined development.

entry.title: freecyberhawk/kara_persian_datepicker: Kara Persian Datepicker is a customizable, lightweight date picker for the Persian (Jalali) calendar. It simplifies date selection and allows for easy styling and property customization, perfect for localized web applications.
entry.content: Kara Persian Datepicker is a customizable, lightweight date picker for the Persian (Jalali) calendar. It simplifies date selection and allows for easy styling and property customization, perfect for localized web applications.

entry.title: damodar13/damodar13.github.io: This project is a lightweight, browser-based code editor and compiler for HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It allows users to write, edit, and instantly preview their code in an interactive environment. The editor supports adding new files, switching between them via tabs, and running the code to see the live output in an embedded iframe.
entry.content: This project is a lightweight, browser-based code editor and compiler for HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It allows users to write, edit, and instantly preview their code in an interactive environment. The editor supports adding new files, switching between them via tabs, and running the code to see the live output in an embedded iframe.
